  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import pytest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_multiply, quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_inverse, quaternion_magnitude, quaternion_normalize


def test_quaternion_multiply():
    q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
    expected_result = np.array([-60, 12, 30, 24])
    result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected_result)


def test_quaternion_conjugate():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    expected_result = np.array([1, -2, -3, -4])
    result = quaternion_conjugate(q)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected_result)


def test_quaternion_inverse():
    q = np.array([0, 1, 0, 0]) #i
    expected_result = np.array([0, -1, 0, 0]) #-i
    result = quaternion_inverse(q)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected_result)


def test_quaternion_magnitude():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    expected_result = np.sqrt(1 + 4 + 9 + 16)
    result = quaternion_magnitude(q)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected_result)


def test_quaternion_normalize():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    magnitude = np.sqrt(1 + 4 + 9 + 16)
    expected_result = q / magnitude
    result = quaternion_normalize(q)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected_result)


"
